welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Candelaria, El Salvador! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its stunning beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Candelaria has to offer."

restaurants.name: Ne-kal
restaurants.description: Ne-kal is a bbq joint located in Cojutepeque.

restaurants.name: Vista San Juan
restaurants.description: Vista San Juan is a restaurant located in Candelaria.
restaurants.address: Canton San Juan Miraflores Arriba (Desvio El Poste), Candelaria, Cuscatlán

restaurants.name: Xilotepec Restaurante & Bar
restaurants.description: Xilotepec Restaurante & Bar is a bbq joint located in Cojutepeque.

restaurants.name: Restaurante vista al lago
restaurants.description: Restaurante vista al lago is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pollo Campero
restaurants.description: Pollo Campero is a fried chicken joint located in Cojutepeque.
restaurants.address: Av. José María Rivas (Calle Dr. José Matías Delgado), Cojutepeque, Cuscatlán

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
